page.title: Rockwool
page.description: Distributor of waterproofing, concrete repair, gypsum and sealant materials such as Bostik, Knauf, Yoshino, Boral, Fibrin, Gripset, Shinetsu & Star Series

content: Rockwool stone wool is a non-combustible product with a melting point of approximately 1000 C. They are particularly suitable for thermal insulation, fire protection and sound reduction or absorption.
Rockwool stone wool is inorganic and contains no nutrients. Therefore it will not be attacked by microorganisms. Rockwool stone wool will not rot and does not attract pests.
Contains no CFCs, HFCs, HCFCs or asbestos used in the manufacture of Rockwool products.

ROCKWOOL Safe n Silent Pro is recommended for use in drywall partitioning applications in hospitals, cinemas, schools, offices, residential and industrial buildings. And it can also be used for metal partitions with easy installation, and keeps its shape over time without slumping from the cavity of the wall.
advantages_items: No slump, stiffness that lasts the life of the building
